Package se.swedenconnect.signservice.audit

Interface AuditLogger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SignServiceHandler
    public interface AuditLogger
extends SignServiceHandler
    Interface for the Audit Logger used within the SignService system.

      • auditLog

        void auditLog​(@Nonnull
              AuditEvent event)
       throws AuditLoggerException
        Audit logs the supplied event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be logged
        Throws:
        AuditLoggerException - runtime exception that is thrown if logging fails

      • auditLog

        default void auditLog​(@Nonnull
                      String eventId,
                      @Nonnull
                      Function<AuditEventBuilder,​AuditEvent> build)
               throws AuditLoggerException
        Helper method to audit log in one line.
        Parameters:
        eventId - the event ID for the event
        build - a function that accepts a AuditEventBuilder and produces the AuditEvent.
        Throws:
        AuditLoggerException - runtime exception that is thrown if logging fails
